technicalEvents.title: Hackathon
technicalEvents.name: ARES TECHWAR
technicalEvents.description: Has a modern and tech-savvy vibe, linking the idea of a competitive environment (war) with the concept of complex problem-solving (matrix). It captures both the essence of a hackathon and Ares' spirit of conflict.

technicalEvents.title: Coding and Debugging
technicalEvents.name: POSEIDON'S CODE CURRENT
technicalEvents.description: This name reflects the flow and movement of coding and debugging, evoking Poseidon's control over water currents.

technicalEvents.title: IoT
technicalEvents.name: HEPHAESTUS' FORGE
technicalEvents.description: Hephaestus, god of fire and craftsmanship, relates well to IoT, where devices are 'forged' and connected in the digital world.

technicalEvents.title: Capture the Flag
technicalEvents.name: HERMES' BYTECHASE
technicalEvents.description: Hermes, the swift messenger god, fits perfectly with Capture the Flag, where speed and strategy are key.

technicalEvents.title: UI/UX
technicalEvents.name: APHRODITE'S AURORA
technicalEvents.description: This name emphasizes beauty and design, aligning perfectly with UI/UX while maintaining a connection to Aphrodite.

technicalEvents.title: Gaming
technicalEvents.name: DIONYSUS' BATTLEGROUND
technicalEvents.description: Effectively conveys the competitive and intense nature of a PUBG gaming event while linking it to Dionysus's theme of revelry and excitement. It sounds both engaging and relevant!
